race_form.race_comment: PYRAMID PLACE (4) returned to winning ways at Kempton with 4.5L success in a small field. Can find the double now with a useful claiming jockey on board. Leading contender. DARGIANNINI (1) was last of the four in that same Kempton contest.  Finished 2023 with a win but has yet to find that form after an 11-month break. Possibilities. SANTOS BLUE (2) makes his reappearance after a nine-month layoff. Rounded out last season with a narrow victory at Uttoxeter. One to watch. WAR SOLDIER (6) made a good seasonal return with a 0.5L third at Carlisle. Expected to come on for that performance.

Leading contender. DARGIANNINI (1) was last of the four in that same Kempton contest.  Finished 2023 with a win but has yet to find that form after an 11-month break. Possibilities. SANTOS BLUE (2) makes his reappearance after a nine-month layoff. Rounded out last season with a narrow victory at Uttoxeter. One to watch. WAR SOLDIER (6) made a good seasonal return with a 0.5L third at Carlisle. Expected to come on for that performance.

race_form.race_comment: SAND CRUISER (1) turned in a plain run last time when fifth at this track over 400m behind Stu Mcfly (23.26) in a Grade 5. Has ability and looks hard to stop. TOO MUCH FUN (4) collided with another runner and finished out of the placings when sixth in a Grade 6 last time (17.87) at this track over 300m. Better than last start and can bounce back. YOU'RE BUSTED (7) collided with another runner and finished out of the placings when fourth in a Grade 6 last time (17.69) at this track over 300m. May be worth another try. SILLY OLD BEAR (6) can improve on an unplaced run here last time out.

SILLY OLD BEAR (6) can improve on an unplaced run here last time out.

race_form.race_comment: KNOW EVER (8) has disqualification issues but he is packed with ability and has won three of his last four starts. He looked good again at Le Croise-Laroche and sets a clear standard. KUROKO LAUAR (4) was disqualified last month but can be a threat if smart this time. KANDAR JIEL (9) needed the last run and is sure to improve. KENNEDY JAMES (6) is hard to trust but is also not out of it if wise.

KANDAR JIEL (9) needed the last run and is sure to improve. KENNEDY JAMES (6) is hard to trust but is also not out of it if wise.

race_form.race_comment: CATUNDA ALEX (4) was a strong course and distance winner last time, claiming a D4 in a powerful 15.54 and a new PB here. Has the ability and can measure up again. DYNAMIC LOGAN (5) was never in contention last time at this track, but prior to that won by 0.8 lengths at this track (15.67) beating Ivanhoe Ginger in a D4 on November 29. Key player if finds best. BROSNA STAR (1) jumped from this trap last time and also the same course and distance when a 2.5 lengths third (15.74) in a D4. Leading player again. MAXGROVE DIAMOND (2) is a well performed dog and winner of eight races who is worth forgiving after finishing out of the placings at this track (27.23). Form here at this distance is sound. The form out of last race has been strong. Has ability and can bounce back.

race_form.race_comment: BYLINE (1) proved too strong last start and scored by 1.5 lengths over 1600m at this track. He is a top-class performer who should have the edge over his rivals again. PURE DREAMER (5) scored an impressive win by 8 lengths when resuming from a spell last time out over 1600m in Group 2 class at this track. Has a solid second-up record and he is the main threat to the top pick. THE COVEX KID (7) returns from a layoff of 11 months. Worth noting he filled a minor placing when returning from a spell last time in work over 1600m at this track. Has recorded two wins when first up from a break. Comes here with definite top-three claims. ECOSYSTEM (2) lines up for the first time since March 8. Started his last campaign impressively when in the money over a mile at this track. He comes to hand quickly and can give this a shake.
